type: Tutorial Step - Letâ€™s Try the Easy Way

definition.text: There's an easier alternative, provided there are few nodes in the workspace that can accept the reference.

paragraphs.text: Go to the Trading Engine Reference node on the right and break the existing reference double-clicking the delink button you used before.
The create reference button opens up a list with all nodes present in the workspace that accept a reference from the current node. Let's try it!
Click the create reference button, and select the Low Frequency node from the drop down list.
